description.value: Your eyes are sharp, allowing you to make out small details about concealed or even invisible creatures that others might miss. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when using the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Seek]{Seek} action to find @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} creatures within 30 feet of you. When you target an opponent that is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Concealed]{Concealed} from you or hidden from you, reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or 9 for a hidden one.

rules.label: Keen Eyes (Seek hidden or undetected within 30 feet)
